db:abstract.db:para: The QScxmlExecutableContent namespace contains various types used to interpret executable content in state machines.
This namespace was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.8] QScxmlExecutableContent::AssignmentInfo
db:section.db:para: This struct was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.8] QScxmlExecutableContent::EvaluatorInfo
db:section.db:para: This struct was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.8] QScxmlExecutableContent::ForeachInfo
db:section.db:para: This struct was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.8] QScxmlExecutableContent::InvokeInfo
db:section.db:para: This struct was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.8] QScxmlExecutableContent::ParameterInfo
db:section.db:para: This struct was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.8] QScxmlExecutableContent::ContainerId
db:section.db:para: ID for a container holding executable content.
This typedef was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.8] QScxmlExecutableContent::EvaluatorId
db:section.db:para: ID for a unit of executable content.
This typedef was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.8] QScxmlExecutableContent::InstructionId
db:section.db:para: ID for an instruction of executable content.
This typedef was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.8] QScxmlExecutableContent::StringId
db:section.db:para: ID for a string contained in executable content.
This typedef was introduced in Qt 5.8.
